features: 1 FASHION DOLL, 100+ NEW WAYS TO CUSTOMIZE! Create the ultimate style mashup with My Avastars 11” Fashion Dolls! Just like designing your avatar, customize your doll from head to toe using their 2 opposite looks to make a style unique to you.

MIX & MATCH 2 OUTFITS AND 50+ STICKERS! Choose your face, mix & match fashion pieces & accessories and then style the whole look with stickers. Stickers are reusable, so you can customize your doll again and again.

MEET PINK_PLAYZ. She comes with 2 totally opposite looks perfect for creative gamers. Her GAMERXP look is all about bright pink and bold details that add a gamer flair. And her CRE-8_QT look is sweet and daring with surprising and imaginative accents.

GROW YOUR CLOSET! Grow your My Avastars closet by collecting all dolls, the more you have the more looks you can create! Style new looks with items from all characters! All clothing, wigs, and sticker packs are compatible. And you can mix and match hair pieces like bangs and pigtails for totally personalized hairdos.
WHAT’S INCLUDED. Open box to reveal 1 My Avastars 11” Fashion Doll, 2 outfits, 2 pairs of shoes, 1 wig, 50+ reusable stickers, and 1 collector card.
body.description: Create the ultimate style mashup with My Avastars 11'' Fashion Dolls Update 2.0 by WowWee! Just like designing your avatar, customize your doll from head to toe using their 2 opposite looks to make a style unique to you. Meet Pink_Playz! This Avatar Star is perfect for creative gamers. Unbox to reveal your doll’s 2 outfits, 2 pairs of shoes, 1 wig and 50+ reusable stickers to customize each look. There are 100+ new ways to customize in each box, so the possibilities are endless. Choose your face, mix & match fashion pieces & accessories and then style the whole look with stickers. Stickers are reusable, so you can customize your doll again and again. Grow your My Avastars closet by collecting all the dolls. The more you have, the more unique looks you can create! All My Avastars looks are compatible with each other. Customize your outfits again and again by mixing & matching across characters! Did you know? All My Avastars hairstyles are detachable, so you can swap bangs, pigtails, and space buns for totally personalized hairdos. Fun for ages 6+.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: My Avastars Fashion Dolls: Update 2.0! Pink_Playz Meet Pink_Playz! This Avatar Star is perfect for creative gamers. DJ-Candy Meet DJ-Candy! This Avatar Star is perfect for any candy-loving cutie. Diva_AM.PM Meet Diva_AM.PM! This Avatar Star is perfect for any fashion-obsessed diva. Sneaker_Head Meet Sneaker_Head! This deluxe Avatar Star is perfect for streetwear fashion and sneaker lovers.

Create the ultimate style mashup! Just like designing your avatar, customize your doll from head to toe to make a style unique to you. There are 100+ new ways to customize in each box, so the possibilities are endless. Choose your face, mix & match fashion pieces & accessories and then style the whole look with reusable stickers. Fun for ages 6+. INCLUDES 1 My Avastars 11” Fashion Doll 2 outfits 2 pairs of shoes 1 wig 50+ reusable stickers 1 collector card

MIX & MATCH OUTFITS AND 50+ STICKERS! Choose your face, mix & match fashion pieces & accessories and then style the whole look with stickers. Stickers are reusable, so you can customize your doll again and again. TOTALLY PERSONALIZED HAIRDOS! Did you know? All My Avastars hairstyles are detachable, so you can swap bangs, pigtails, and space buns for totally unique looks. 1 FASHION DOLL, 100+ NEW WAYS TO CUSTOMIZE! Unbox to reveal your doll’s 2 outfits, 2 pairs of shoes, 1 wig and 50+ reusable stickers to customize each look. There are 100+ new ways to customize in each box, so the possibilities are endless!
GROW YOUR COLLECTION! Grow your My Avastars closet by collecting all dolls, the more you have the more looks you can create! All clothing, wigs, and sticker packs are compatible.

DOLL OF THE YEAR FINALIST! My Avastars Fashion Dolls are 2022 Toy of The Year finalists! These fan-favorite dolls bring the fun of creating personalized digital avatars to real life. Mix & match clothing items, face stickers, clothing decals, tattoo stickers, and accessory decals to make your My Avastars doll unique to you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Doll.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my 4yr old niece. She loves playing with the doll. Countless ways to create your own fashion ideas. Very Good Product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your child will love this!
reviews.reviewText: There are so many options to change the Ava stars expression! My daughter absolutely loves this toy! It is a very high quality and durable gift, however, I will say that the hair pieces sometimes fall off easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like how it looks like the pictures and came out very cute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great idea, needs one minor improvement
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves this doll and I do think it’s a pretty great and cute idea. Stickers aren’t an issue and they stick fine. We love the quality and how large of a doll this is (great for her rough handedness). The only issue is (with this one, anyways) as mentioned in the other reviews is the hair. It does not lock together with the head and constantly falls off. Very annoying. Even had the hubby try to use some man-strength to help. Nada. Other than that it’s a very cute idea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Súper good quality
reviews.reviewText: Cute toy super good quality great price and overall good size!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Able to change outfits 🤗
reviews.reviewText: This was a great gift for my 10yr old grand daughter! She was so excited

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fun Roblox Doll with Hair Issues
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is a huge Roblox fan, so I bought her this doll as a birthday gift. She was thrilled to have a doll that she could dress up and change its facial expression. However, the hair on the doll was a bit of a problem. As many reviews had pointed out, it had difficulty staying on - in fact, it just wouldn't stay on at all. This was frustrating for my daughter, and she ended up playing with the doll bald until we super glued the hair on. Once we did that, though, she started playing with the doll nonstop- she even cuddles with it at bedtime. All in all, I do recommend this doll, but it's important to note that the hairpiece can be a bit of an issue. However, if you're willing to do a little MacGyvering, the toy is worth buying, especially if your kid is into Roblox.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Avastars Fashion Doll
reviews.reviewText: My daughter saw this doll on YT kids and had to have it. Shipping was super fast and she absolutely loves the doll. Thinking of ordering another very soon!! Parts are easy to put on and take off. Stickers are good quality and don't rip too easily.
Es de buen material y le encanta a mi hija, lo que faltaría y sería buena idea es que fuera fácil conseguir accesorios extra.

reviews.reviewTitle: It cane in the same week
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves it I recommend it as I will be buying more!
Muy bonita mi hija quedo encantada
